thread.title: Thompson’s lead shrinks to 8 points over Christner
thread.title_full: Thompson’s lead shrinks to 8 points over Christner

author: hdmoadmin
title: Thompson’s lead shrinks to 8 points over Christner
text:
6:02 am - October 20, 2015 Thompson’s lead shrinks to 8 points over Christner 
Week seven of the Ole Timers HORSE Men’s Basketball League saw 26 players participate on Oct. 15. Val Chandler, Daryl Henry and Hans Kappen led all scorers, with 14 points each. Tom Christner was close behind with 13 points, while Skip Mitchell and David O’Brien had 12 points each and moved into a tie for fourth place. Bill Fogelsanger, Keith Pochert and Sam Thompson each scored 11 points. You are invited to join them at 9 a.m. on Thursday mornings at the Jessieville Arena, located behind Jessieville School. The league is open to all men over age 50. The cost to join is $15 and includes the banquet. The Top 15 leaders after week seven are: 
Sam Thompson 91 Tom Christner 83 Val Chandler 79 Skip Mitchell 68 David O’Brien 68 Roger Hinz 67 Chuck Allen 65 Randy Fairman 60 John Herring 60 Harold Scherer 58 
Mark Bencriscutto 56 Daryl Henry 53 Larry Rogers 53 Ken Fitzgerald 51 Bill Fogelsanger 48 
If you have any questions, call Roger Hinz at 922-4183 or Ken Fitzgerald at 922-9393.
